required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on November 19, 2021
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: Evaluation of LBL-003 Phase I Study in Patients With Advanced Malignancies
clinical_study.official_title: Phase I Clinical Study to Evaluate the Safety, Tolerability, Pharmacokinetic Characteristics and Preliminary Efficacy of LBL-003 Injection in Patients With Advanced Malignancies

brief_summary.textblock: A phase I clinical study evaluating LBL-003 in the treatment of subjects with advanced solid tumors .

detailed_description.textblock: This study is a phase I clinical study evaluating LBL-003 monotherapy in patients with advanced solid tumors in dose escalation. The overall design of the study is shown in the figure below. The purpose of the LBL-003 single-dose escalation study in subjects with advanced solid tumors is to evaluate the safety and tolerability of monotherapy to determine the MTD (or MAD) and clinically recommended doses of LBL-003 monotherapy.

primary_outcome.measure: Number of subjcects with adverse events and serious adverse events
primary_outcome.time_frame: All subjects signed the informed consent form to the completion of the follow-up period of drug withdrawal (30±7 days after drug withdrawal or before the start of new anti-tumor therapy) ]
primary_outcome.description: The safety profile of LBL-003 will be assessed by monitoring the adverse event(AE) per the National Cancer Institute Common Terminology Criteria for Adverse Events(NCI CTCAE)v5.0

primary_outcome.time_frame: During the first two Cycles(each cycle is 14 days)
primary_outcome.description: MTD is defined as the hightest dose level at which no more than 1 out of 6 subjects experiences a DLT during the first two cycles.

primary_outcome.time_frame: During the first two Cycles(each cycle is 14 days)
primary_outcome.description: DLT is defined as a toxicities(adverse event at least possibly related to LBL-003 )occurring during the DLT observation period(the initial 28 days).

arm_group.arm_group_label: A phase I clinical study evaluating LBL-003 in the treatment of subjects with advanced solid tumors
arm_group.description: Drug: LBL-003Injection The test drugLBL-003will be preset with 6 escalation dose levels: dose A, dose B, dose C, dose D and dose E, dose F , administered twice a week.

intervention.description: LBL-003 was given every two weeks for treatment
intervention.arm_group_label: A phase I clinical study evaluating LBL-003 in the treatment of subjects with advanced solid tumors
